title: Educational Technology Course Design Utilizing Interest-Based Challenge Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Education Experience and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Learners possess intermediate-level scientific literacy, with intensive 3-hour sessions twice weekly. Digital devices are provided by the educational institution

learning_goals: Learners can complete interest-based challenge tasks at least 80% of the time using educational technology tools.
Learners collaboratively develop creative science education solutions with peers and successfully present final projects.
Learners evaluate scientific problem-solving competencies and establish improvement plans through weekly mini-challenges.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
